name: The Legendary Mushroom
description:
===========================================================

This game was made in 4 days for pixel jam. 

-------------------------------------------Controls--------------------------------------------

WASD to move

CLICK to shoot

SCROOL UP/DOWN to change slots in inventory

--------------------------------------How to play----------------------------------------------

Shoot at the mushrooms. Collect coins. Buy new guns from store (the new items will apeare as you go further)

------------------------------------For game jam----------------------------------------------

Am I a begginer:

I don't know and not sure, lets say that I am not a begginer

The game was created using python and pygame library.
